data.name: Accessory_CreatedAt_Description
data.value: The timestamp at which the accessory was created.

data.name: Accessory_CreatedBy_Description
data.value: The user who created the accessory.

data.name: Accessory_Description
data.value: An equippable cosmetic. It does not alter the skills or statistics of a hero.

data.name: Accessory_Description_Description
data.value: The description associated with the accessory.

data.name: Accessory_ModifiedAt_Description
data.value: The timestamp at which the accessory was last modified.

data.name: Accessory_ModifiedBy_Description
data.value: The user who last modified the accessory.

data.name: Accessory_Tag_Description
data.value: The tag associated with the accessory.

data.name: Accessory_Version_Description
data.value: The version number associated with the accessory.

data.name: Artist_Company_Description

data.name: DamageType_Magical_Description
data.value: Magical weapon. Damage reduced by target's Res.

data.name: DamageType_Physical_Description
data.value: Physical weapon. Damage reduced by target's Def.

data.value: The default rarity associated with the hero skill.

data.value: The unlock rarity associated with the hero skill.

data.value: The artist to which the hero is associated,

data.value: The base hit points (HP) value of the hero.

data.value: The base resistance (Res) value of the hero.

data.name: Hero_BaseSpeed_Description
data.value: The base speed (Spd) value of the hero.

data.name: Hero_BVID_Description
data.value: The Base Vector ID associated with the hero. Used to calculate statistic growth,.

data.value: The color associated with the hero.

data.name: MovementType_Armored_Description
data.value: Armored unit. Can move one space.

data.name: MovementType_Cavalry_Description
data.value: Cavalry unit. Can move three spaces. Cannot move through forests.

data.name: MovementType_Flying_Description
data.value: Flying unit. Can move two spaces. Ignores forests, mountains, rivers, etc., when moving.

data.name: MovementType_Infantry_Description
data.value: Infantry unit. Can move two spaces. Slowed by forests, etc.

data.value: A permissible movement type associated with a skill.

data.value: The ID of the skill movement type.

data.name: Skill_CreatedBy_Description
data.value: The user who created the skill.

data.name: Skill_Description
data.value: A skill that can be learned by a hero.

data.name: Skill_Description_Description
data.value: The description associated with the skill.

data.name: Skill_GroupName_Description
data.value: The name of the skill group to which the skill is associated.

data.name: Skill_HitPointsModifier_Description
data.value: The hit points (HP) modifier, if any, associated with the skill.

data.name: Skill_IsAvailableAsSacredSeal_Description
data.value: A value indicating whether the skill is available as a sacred seal.

data.name: Skill_IsExclusive_Description
data.value: A value indicating whether the skill is exclusive to a single hero.

data.name: Skill_Might_Description
data.value: The might, if any, associated with the skill.

data.name: Skill_ModifiedAt_Description
data.value: The timestamp at which the skill was last modified.

data.name: Skill_ModifiedBy_Description
data.value: The user who last modified the skill.

data.value: The range, if any, associated with the skill.

data.value: The resistance (Res) modifier, if any, associated with the skill.

data.value: The permissible movement types for the skill.

data.value: The skill points required to learn the skill.

data.name: Skill_SkillWeaponEffectivenesses_Description
data.value: The weapon effectivenesses associated with the skill.

data.name: Skill_SkillWeaponTypes_Description
data.value: The permissible weapon types for the skill.

data.name: Skill_SpeedModifier_Description
data.value: The speed (Spd) modifier, if any, associated with the skill.

data.name: Skill_Tag_Description
data.value: The tag associated with the skill.

data.name: Skill_Version_Description
data.value: The version number associated with the skill.

data.name: Skill_WeaponRefineType_Description
data.value: The type of the weapon refinement, if any, applied to the skill.

data.name: Statistic_Attack_Description
data.value: The higher a unit's Attack, the more damage it will inflict on foes.

data.name: Statistic_Defense_Description
data.value: The higher a unit's Defense is, the less damage they take from physical attacks (swords, axes, lances, etc.).

data.name: Statistic_HitPoints_Description
data.value: A unit is defeated if its Hit Points reach 0.

data.name: Statistic_Resistance_Description
data.value: The higher a unit's Resistance is, the less damage they take from magical attacks (spells, staves, breath effects, etc.).

data.name: Statistic_Speed_Description
data.value: A unit will attack twice if its Speed is at least 5 more than its foe's Speed.

data.name: VoiceActor_CreatedAt_Description
data.value: The timestamp at which the voice actor was created.
